name: Arison
description: Arison Perfumes' POS app enables efficient invoicing with a barcode scanner for price calculations and includes offline financial tracking for workers.
about: A POS mobile app for Arison Perfumes to help their workers generate invoices. The app features a barcode scanner to determine the bottle capacity, and then user then selects the perfume to be filled, with the app calculating the price accordingly. The app also includes a section for workers to input expenses and the amount withdrawn from the cash box. The app is designed to support offline mode.
